articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppets Warned Not to Act Rashly
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppets Warned Not to Act Rashly
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea today issued a statement denouncing the United States and the south Korean puppets for planning to stage large-scale joint military maneuvers Key Resolve and Foal Eagle across south Korea from March 9 at any cost defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK and unanimous protest at home and abroad.
					 The projected joint military maneuvers are a grave provocation to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and a criminal act against peace as they will seriously endanger the security of the Korean nation and the situation in the region, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The committee in the name of all Koreans bitterly denounces the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group for the projected DPRK-targeted war maneuvers aimed at bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This saber-rattling is large-scale war exercises, the first of their kind since the emergence of the new administration in the United States. The moves stepped up by the U.S. and the south Korean puppets to provoke a nuclear war after massively introducing various types of nuclear weapons into south Korea clearly prove that they are the arch criminals standing in the way of denuclearizing the Peninsula and that the "denuclearization" much touted by them is nothing but a smokescreen to cover up their scenario to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The above-said war maneuvers will be staged under the situation where the north-south agreement on putting an end to the politico-military standoff and preventing military conflicts has been declared totally null and void due to the frantic moves of the Lee group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. They are, therefore, so dangerous actions for war that they may develop into an actual war any moment.
					
					 Under the touch-and-go situation where the north and the south are in full combat readiness and level their rifles and artillery pieces at each other, no one can guess what will trigger off a war.
					
					 The DPRK's military force for self-defence will never allow any slightest provocation or its sign in the sky, land and sea but deal decisive and devastating blows at the aggressors.
					
					 Under the situation prevailing in the Peninsula no one knows what military conflicts will be touched off by the reckless war exercises of the U.S. and the puppet clique for a war of aggression against the DPRK. It is, therefore, compelled to declare that security cannot be guaranteed for south Korean civil airplanes flying through the territorial air of our side and its vicinity, its territorial air and its vicinity above the East Sea of Korea, in particular, while the military exercises are under way.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppets are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can browbeat someone by demonstrating what they call "alliance" and "force" through the projected saber rattling and get rid of their domestic and international crisis. On the contrary, it will bring into bolder relief the true colors as confrontational maniacs and aggressors.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee group would be well advised to stop their rash acts, properly understanding the fixed will and spirit of the revolutionary armed forces and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Nomination and Registration of Candidates for Deputies to SPA Finished
articles.content:
Nomination and Registration of Candidates for Deputies to SPA Finished
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A report of the Central Election Committee was published on March 4.
					According to the report, since General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent an open letter to all voters throughout the country to inform the citizens that he decided to register as a candidate for deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly at Constituency No. 333 for the election of deputy to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly, the nomination and registration of candidates for deputies to the 12th SPA have been successfully finished at all other constituencies of the country.
					
					  At all voters' meetings for nominating candidates for deputies to the 12th SPA officials, servicepersons, workers, farmers and intellectuals were nominated as candidates for deputies to the SPA as they have devotedly worked for the party and the leader, the country and the people true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the report said, and noted:
					
					 The entire electorate expressed expectation and conviction that the nominated candidates for deputies would devote themselves to the sacred struggle to strengthen the government of the Republic, firmly defend the socialist system and build a great prosperous and powerful nation. 
					
					  The Central Election Committee reported that all constituency election committees throughout country have correctly registered the candidates for deputies who had been nominated according to the Law on the Elections of Deputies to the People's Assemblies at All Levels of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as those candidates for deputies to the SPA to be elected at their constituencies.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Australian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Australian Ambassador
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Peter Jason Rowe, Australian ambassador who paid a farewell visit to him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Brunei Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Brunei Ambassador
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Magdalene Teo, ambassador of Brunei Darussalam to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 On hand were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and a staff member of Brunei embassy.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Brunei Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Brunei Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a conversation with Magdalene Teo, ambassador of Brunei Darussalam to the DPRK, on Thursday when she paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Many People Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Many People Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of visitors is flowing to the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum in the DPRK.
					 On display there are revolutionary relics and historic materials and data showing the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					 In the last decade alone, many photographic documents, revolutionary relics and historic materials and data were ascertained and additionally displayed, among them 15 photos of the President and relics and data on the revolutionary activities of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Since its emergence on March 5, Juche 48 (1959), the museum has been visited by servicepersons, working people of different strata and school youth and children, more than 7,200,000 in all.
					
					 Over 60,000 overseas compatriots and foreigners have visited the museum over the past five decades.

articles.title: Exhibition of Weapons and Equipment Remains Goes on
articles.content:
Exhibition of Weapons and Equipment Remains Goes on
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of weapons and equipment remains concentrically showing the outstanding wisdom and talent of the Korean nation is going on in the Korean Central History Museum.
					 The Korean nation made various kinds of high-efficient weapons and equipment to suit the constitutional character of the Koreans and the natural and geographical conditions of the country for the purpose of strengthening the national defence power and displayed their might to the full in battles against invaders from olden times.
					
					 On display there are more than 50 pieces of relics of weapons and equipment used by the nation from the primitive times to the period of Ri Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 Among them are a Pipha-shaped dagger and a narrow brass dagger, peculiar to Korea in remote ages, Soenoe (a mechanical archery with shooting device) which was made in the period of Ancient Korea and used even in the days of Ri Dynasty as well as in the periods of three Kingdoms and Koryo, Kaema (an armor-clad horse) belonging to Koguryo which played a role of shock force breaking through the enemy line in the van of the combat formation.
					
					 Attracting the attention of the visitors are weapons and equipment which made a great contribution to the development of the world military science and technology.
					
					 Stirrups were invented by the Koguryo people for the first time in the world and widely disseminated to the neighboring areas and countries.
					
					 Among the exhibits are the iron-clad warship "turtle ship", the first of its kind in the world, which greatly contributed to repulsing Japanese invaders in the Sachon, Hansan and other naval battles during the Imjin Patriotic War (1592), Pigyokjinchonroe (a kind of gun), which was recorded in the world artillery history and Singijongihwacha, which is the origin of multiple-stage rocket launcher. All of them are the proud military heritage of the Korean nation.
					
					 The exhibits clearly show the patriotism of the nation who made efforts to strengthen the national defence capabilities.

articles.title: Law Which Made Long-cherished Desire of Peasants Realized
articles.content:
Law Which Made Long-cherished Desire of Peasants Realized
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Sixty-three years have elapsed since the Agrarian Reform Law was promulgated in the DPRK amid the warm care shown for the people by President Kim Il Sung to put a period to the feudal relations of land ownership and the exploiting system and to realize the cherished-old aspiration of the peasants.
					 Born into the revolutionary family of Mangyongdae which had led a tenant's life generation after generation, the President was well aware of the desire of the peasants to have their own land and put his heart and soul into the struggle for realizing their desire to become the master of land from the first days since he started revolutionary activities.
					
					 He illuminated the way for freeing the peasants from the feudal fetters in his famous works including "Path of the Korean Revolution" and "The Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" published in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. And he saw to it that land was distributed to the peasants free of charge and democratic reforms were enforced for the interests of the working masses in the guerrilla bases founded along theTuman River.
					
					 Right after the liberation of the country he set forth the agrarian reform as the foremost task in the enforcement of all the democratic reforms and advanced an original policy for successfully carrying out the agrarian reform under the slogan "Land to the tillers!"
					
					 The policy reflecting the then subjective and objective conditions at the stage of the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution was a unique and wise one fundamentally differing from the socialist reform of nationalizing the land and the bourgeois reform of privatizing the land.
					
					In accordance with this policy, the Agrarian Reform Law was promulgated in the DPRK on March 5, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					The agrarian reform was a great event of historical significance which made the peasants, once exploited and humiliated, a creator of history and afforded freedom and happiness to them.
					
					With the successful enforcement of the historic agrarian reform, the Korean peasants got rid of the feudal shackles once and for all and came to enjoy to their heart's content an independent and creative worthwhile life as the master of land and their destiny.

articles.title: Famous "Song of Ploughing"
articles.content:
Famous "Song of Ploughing"
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The famous song "Song of Ploughing" is ringing out on the cooperative fields of Korea which have ushered in the spring. 
					 The song, created after promulgation of the historic Agrarian Reform Law (March 5, 1946) is one of the favorite songs of the Korean people.
					
					 It is a kind of lyric folk-song reflecting the joy of the peasants who plough their land for the first time in their life thanks to the agrarian reform enforced under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The words of a song with three stanzas expresses well the pulsating worthwhile working life of the peasants who are ploughing and sowing seeds with the joy and pride of being the master of the land in close combination with the beautiful landscape of the new country.
					
					 Its melody reflects well the national emotion and optimistic spirit with bright sound color, advancement of fluent sound, calling of cuckoo, tone of "Oh" and merry sound of "eruhwa, teruhwa".

articles.title: War Exercises to Be Staged by Lee Myung Bak Group with U.S. Forces Slammed
articles.content:
War Exercises to Be Staged by Lee Myung Bak Group with U.S. Forces Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises to be staged by the Lee Myung Bak group across south Korea together with the U.S. forces are obviously saber-rattling against the DPRK, says Minju Joson Thursday in a signed commentary.
					 The above-said fact is evidenced by the scale, duration and nature of the joint military exercises, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This year's joint war maneuvers are also designed to examine and round off the preparations for a war of aggression against the DPRK stepped up by the south Korean puppet army together with the U.S. forces under the simulated conditions of an actual war.
					
					 The warmongers' claim that the projected war drills are for "defense" and the like is no more than sophism to conceal their real aim and mislead the public opinion.
					
					 The announcement of the plan for the said war exercises came after the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea published a statement in connection with the fact that the inter-Korean relations have reached such worst phase as the brink of war indicates that the Lee group is getting frantic in its moves to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK by straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 It is needless to say that any slightest military conflict that may break out during the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises launched by huge puppet armed forces together with U.S. forces can rapidly develop into a thermo nuclear war.
					
					 The Lee group's increased war hysteria for aggression against the DPRK will only invite merciless and powerful retaliatory actions of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet warmongers would be well advised to bear in mind that their attempt to unleash a war of aggression against the DPRK together with the U.S. at any cost would lead to self-destruction.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Clarify Its Will to Redress Its Past
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Clarify Its Will to Redress Its Past
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Japan should clarify its will to settle its past if it is to have a future, restore confidence between the DPRK and Japan and improve the bilateral relations.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 Recalling that some days ago Japanese Prime Minister Aso in his "policy speech for 2009" said he would strive for the normalization of the ties between Japan and the DPRK while referring to someone's "abduction, nuclear and missile issues," the article observes that his remarks cannot convince anyone as they are falsifying truth about the issue of improving the bilateral relations and misleading the public opinion on it. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove that Japan committed unprecedented crimes against the Koreans during its occupation and rule over Korea in the first half of the last century, the article notes that such crimes are the most hideous ones as they were aimed to completely destroy a country and a nation and it is, therefore, an unavoidable political responsibility for Japan to redeem them from the viewpoint of international law. 
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Japan should honestly admit that the Japanese imperialists perpetrated massacres of Koreans in violation of international law in the past to exterminate the Korean nation and own a state responsibility for those crimes. 
					
					 There can be neither confidence nor improved relations between the DPRK and Japan unless Japan redresses its crime-woven past. 
					
					 The issue of improving the bilateral relations can be successfully settled only when good-neighborly relations are opened between the two countries in the interests of their peoples as required by the times on the basis of Japan's settlement of its inglorious past.
					
					 Japan's settlement of its past is the core issue enshrined in the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and the master key to normalizing the bilateral relations. 
					
					 The present Japanese ruling forces are, however, taking a negative approach towards the above-said declaration. They are running the whole gamut of petty tricks to evade legal, moral and state responsibilities at any cost, whitewashing the above-said crimes, far from making reflection and reparation for those unheard-of crimes committed by Japan against the Koreans in the past. 
					
					 They are frantically pursuing a hostile policy towards the DPRK and escalating their moves for reinvasion, talking about someone's non-existent "military threat". It is aimed to stir up bitterness toward the DPRK in the Japanese society and revive militarism and convert Japan into a military power in a bid to realize its old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 It is pity that Japan has no statesmen with intellectual thinking power and vision, concludes the article.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Preserve National Character
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Preserve National Character
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The advantageous national character of the Koreans is a foundation for achieving the great national unity and national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article. 
					 It is only the national character that can serve as a foundation for achieving the great national unity and national reunification irrespective of differences in systems, ideologies, isms, political views and religious faith, classes and strata between the north and the south, the temporary phenomena caused by the national split, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the common mentality of every member of a nation to love his nation and value the national character. If all Koreans regard this national identity as a basis, they can unite as one irrespective of the differing ideologies and systems between the north and the south and reunify the country.
					
					 The community of the nation was formed and has been consolidated through its history spanning 5 000 years is strong enough to overcome the above-mentioned differences in ideologies, isms and systems. This is clearly evidenced by the great vitality of "By our nation itself" which reflects the spirit of national independence and patriotism. The June 15 era of reunification instills into all the fellow countrymen conviction and optimism that the cause of national reunification is sure to win only when they preserve and glorify the national character.
					
					 The adoption of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration provided all the fellow countrymen with an opportunity to preserve the homogeneity and identity of the Korean nation. The hearts of the Koreans in the north and the south are burning with the patriotic enthusiasm to achieve the national unity and reunification though they differ in ideologies and systems. The course of the advance of the June 15 era of reunification that witnessed the strengthening of the process of national reconciliation and unity and the development of the movement for national reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" proves that if all Koreans pool their intention and will by preserving the national identity peculiar to them, they can surely attain unity and reunification no matter how desperately foreign forces may hamstring the efforts to attain reunification.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should positively turn out in the struggle to preserve and glorify the national character, bearing deep in mind that the national character serves as a precious asset for accomplishing the cause of national reunification advancing under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration.

articles.title: Elimination of Pro-Japanese, Pro-American Forces Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Elimination of Pro-Japanese, Pro-American Forces Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea released statements on Sunday to mark the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising, at which they called for putting period to outsiders' domination and intervention and realizing national independence.
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification said that the uprising demonstrated the strong self-esteem of the Koreans determined to reject the imperialists' colonial domination and remain an independent and dignified nation.
					
					 90 years have passed since then, but south Korea is now in a wretched plight where the GIs lord it over and the sycophantic and treacherous forces beautifying Japan's past monstrous crimes are swaggering about, it deplored.
					
					 Contending that the pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese traitors should be certainly wiped out to ensure the genuine independence of the nation, the organization called for a massive struggle to overthrow the Lee Myung Bak flunkeyist regime.
					
					 The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down charged that the Lee "government" has resorted to confrontation with the fellow countrymen while calling for "alliance" with the U.S. and Japan, thus bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and bringing the dark clouds of war to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The organization declared that it would stand in the van of the struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and force the Lee regime, a group of anti-reunification elements, to step down and intensify the struggle to drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea.
					
					 On the same day, members of reunification movement organizations, including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, and citizens held a rally in Seoul and made public a declaration stressing that they would fight to the last to win democracy and accelerate national reunification.

articles.title: Madcap War Exercises Targeted against DPRK Go On in S. Korea
articles.content:
Madcap War Exercises Targeted against DPRK Go On in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are now staging large-scale war exercises for aggression against the DPRK in various parts of south Korea, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 On Mar. 3 the sixth special operation flying squadron of the U.S. air force and special operation flying squadron 255 under the 15th composite flying corps of the puppet air force staged what they called a "combined exchange exercise" aimed at "acquiring the special operation tactics and increasing the capability for airlifting troops and combat materiel at night." Special agents of the 5th tactical airborne corps of the puppet air force were involved in that exercise. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean  puppet warmongers announced that the war maneuver would be under way in the military bases in Songnam, Kyonggi Province, and Taegu till Mar. 30.
					
					 Meanwhile, the first fleet of the puppet navy launched a large-scale naval maneuver in the East Sea of Korea on Mar. 3 with more than 10 warships and aircraft and huge troops involved. 
					
					 In another development, special units of the puppet navy and coastal police were busy with such military exercises as a maritime blocking operation and an anti-submarine exercise, etc. to counter any "provocation in the waters along the northern limit line." 
					
					 A drill for mobilizing puppet reserve forces has been under way in different parts of south Korea including Pusan and Ulsan since Mar. 2.
					
					 The bellicose forces are threatening that any person boycotting this military exercise slated to last till Nov. 9 is liable to punishment including penal servitude. 
					
					 The above-said reckless war maneuvers are going on in the sky, land and seas of south Korea in the run-up to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises aimed at invading the DPRK.

articles.title: Koreans in China Censure Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
Koreans in China Censure Lee Myung Bak Group
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on Feb. 28 released a statement titled "We censure the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its indelible crimes against the nation."
					 The statement disclosed that traitor Lee Myung Bak has cracked down on the patriotic and democratic forces in south Korea and mercilessly trampled down the people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification by his mediaeval repressive rule, pursuing the sycophantic and traitorous policy during one year of his office.
					
					 The traitor committed the crime of totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration after designating to the important posts of power the anti-reunification elements steeped in sycophancy toward the U.S. and fascism to the marrow of their bones, it charged.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 The south Korean economy is now at a catastrophic crisis and the people's livelihood in dire distress. However, the Lee group disregards the south Korean people's living conditions and is getting hell-bent only on the anti-reunification moves while openly revealing its sinister intention to incite the north-south confrontation in gross violation of their desire.
					
					 Traitor Lee is the arch enemy of the nation as he went the lengths of blaring that "it is the ultimate goal to unify the Korean Peninsula under the system of liberal democracy" and destroyed all the agreements reached between the north and the south, thus driving the situation of the peninsula to the brink of war, the statement said, adding: It is impossible to expect not only national reunification but also peace and security of the peninsula as long as the traitor is allowed to exist.
					
					 It declared that the general association and all Koreans in China would fully support the south Korean people's just struggle to wipe out the Lee group and do their utmost to bring earlier the day of victory in the struggle.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Treachery Censured by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Treachery Censured by Overseas Koreans
						
Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine (Ukrainian Kothongryon) issued a statement titled "The treacherous crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak group during one year of its office can never be pardoned" on Feb. 27.
					 The statement said what cannot be overlooked in the crimes of the Lee group is that it has persisted in confrontation with fellow countrymen after inventing such watchwords as "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars."
					
					 It stressed that the June 15 era of reunification converted the north-south relations of distrust and confrontation, which had lasted more than half a century, into the relations of reconciliation and unity and this proved that "By our nation itself" is the noble patriotic idea for accelerating the independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 This notwithstanding, traitor Lee denied the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and refused to implement them, thus committing the crimes against the nation and reunification, it charged.
					
					 The statement declared that the Ukrainian Kothongryon would not allow any factors deviating from the historic inter-Korean declarations but defend and implement the declarations for the reunification of the country and the prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Terminados nominacion y registro de diputados a la APS en Corea
articles.content:
Terminados nominacion y registro de diputados a la APS en Corea
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Comite Electoral Central publico el dia 4 la informacion de que despues de que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio a todos los electores del pais un mensaje oficial de ser registrado como candidato a diputado de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la circunscripcion electoral No.333 para las elecciones de diputados a la XI Legislatura de la APS, todos los demas distritos electorales terminaron con exito la labor de nominacion y registro de los candidatos a diputados. 
					Segun el documento,? las reuniones de los electores presentaron como candidatos a los diputados de la APS los funcionarios, militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, obreros, campesinos e intelectuales quienes en pleno acato a la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar) luchan abnegadamente por el partido y el Lider, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Todos los electores expresaron la esperanza y conviccion de que los candidatos a diputados recomendados dediquen todo lo suyo a la lucha sagrada por fortalecer el Poder de la RPDC, defender con firmeza el regimen socialista y construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					El Comite Electoral Central dio a conocer que todos los comites electorales distritales del pais registraron correctamente a los candidatos a diputados de la APS recomendados segun la ley de elecciones a los diputados de las asambleas populares a todos niveles de la RPDC como los candidatos a diputados de la APS a ser elegidos en sus respectivos distritos electorales.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia el ejercicio belico "Key Resolve"-"Aguilucho"
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia el ejercicio belico "Key Resolve"-"Aguilucho"
 Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este jueves, el periodico Minju Joson revelo que el ejercicio militar conjunto "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", que la banda de Lee Myung Bak va a desplegar en toda la extension surcoreana junto con las tropas norteamericanas, persigue evidentemente la guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Lo comprueba el tamano, el periodo y el caracter de esa maniobra, indica el comentarista citando datos y prosigue:
					
					 Tambien en el ejercicio militar de este ano, el ejercito titere surcoreano intenta revisar y perfeccionar con las tropas norteamericanas en el ambiente de la guerra de verdad los preparativos para la guerra anti-RPDC que han hecho entretanto.
					
					  Sin embargo, para ocultar su verdadero caracter y enganar a la opinion publica, los belicistas difunden el sofisma de que ese entrenamiento es para la "defensa".
					
					 El plan del ejercicio militar conjunto "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" fue anunciado poco despues de que se dio a la publicidad una declaracion del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria con motivo de que las relaciones N-S se hallan en la peor situacion a punto de guerra.
					
					 Este hecho demuestra que la banda de Lee Myung Bak actua demencialmente para desatar a toda costa la guerra contra el Norte al agravar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  No cabe duda de que si ocurre algun conflicto militar, aunque sea pequeno, cuando los titeres surcoreanos despliegan junto con EE.UU el polemico ejercicio militar movilizando a colosales fuerzas armadas, esto dara lugar a la guerra termonuclear.
					
					  La represalia del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC sera mas implacable y fuerte cada vez que la banda de Lee Myung Bak intensifique su frenetica campana belicista contra la RPDC.
					
					  Los belicistas titeres surcoreanos deben darse cuenta de que provocar la guerra contra el Norte en contubernio con EE.UU. sera un acto de suicidio.

articles.title: Japon debe aclarar su voluntad de liquidar los crimenes del pasado
articles.content:
Japon debe aclarar su voluntad de liquidar los crimenes del pasado
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- Para tener el futuro, recuperar la confianza y mejorar las relaciones entre Corea y Japon, este debe aclarar primero su voluntad de liquidar los crimenes cometidos en el siglo pasado.
					Hace unos dias, en el "discurso sobre la politica gubernamental para el ano 2009", el premier japones Aso volvio a cuestionar los "problemas de secuestro, armas nucleares y misiles" de alguien y dijo con hipocresia que "se esforzaria por normalizar las relaciones interestatales entre Japon y Corea".
					
					  Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					Nadie le hara caso a ese pais isleno por mucho que el trata de enganar a la opinion publica tergiversando la verdad en cuanto al problema del mejoramiento de las relaciones Corea-Japon.
					
					Hay de sobra los datos reveladores de los inauditos crimenes que cometieron los imperialistas japoneses en la primera mitad del siglo pasado contra el pueblo coreano durante la ocupacion y la dominacion colonial sobre Corea.
					
					Estos crimenes constituyen los mas infames que se cometieron para exterminar a un pais y una nacion y una ineludible responsabilidad politica en vista del derecho internacional.
					
					Japon debe reconocer sinceramente que el genocidio de los coreanos en el siglo pasado fue un crimen para exterminar a la nacion coreana en violacion del derecho internacional y asumir la responsabilidad estatal por el respecto.
					
					Sin la liquidacion de tal pasado, no se puede establecer nunca la confianza y las relaciones entre los dos paises.
					
					Es decir, el problema del mejoramiento de las relaciones bilaterales sera resuelto satisfactoriamente cuando ambos paises establezcan las relaciones de buena vecindad y amistad conforme a sus intereses y la demanda de la epoca basandose en la liquidacion del erroneo pasado de Japon.
					
					Este asunto es el articulo principal de la Declaracion Corea-Japon de Pyongyang y la llave de la normalizacion de las relaciones entre los dos paises.
					
					Sin embargo, al dar espaldas a dicha declaracion, las actuales fuerzas gobernantes de Japon dan tinte positivo a los crimenes del pasado en vez de arrepentirse y recompensarlos y recurren a las artimanas de toda indole para eludir las responsabilidades legal, moral y estatal por el respecto.
					
					Ademas, practican demencialmente la politica hostil a Corea y se preparan para reagredirla pretextando la inexistente "amenaza militar" a partir de su intento de realizar su anejado sueno de implantar la "esfera de co-prosperidad de gran Asia oriental" al inculcar en la sociedad japonesa el sentimiento hostil a Corea, resucitar el militarismo y convertir a Japon en una potencia militar.
					
					El problema es que en Japon no hay politicos inteligentes con prevision.

articles.title: EE.UU. y Sur de Corea libran ejercicio de guerra anti-RPDC
articles.content:
EE.UU. y Sur de Corea libran ejercicio de guerra anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ATCC) -- Segun "Yonhap News", en estos dias, los imperialistas yanquis y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos libran en muchas partes el ejercicio de guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					  El batallon no. 6 para las operaciones especiales de las fuerzas aereas de Estados Unidos y el no.255 de la aviacion mixta no.15 de las fuerzas aereas titeres del Sur de Corea libraron el dia 3 el "entrenamiento combinado de intercambio" con el objetivo de "adiestrar la tactica de la operacion especial y mejorar la capacidad del lanzamiento nocturno de efectivos y materiales belicos".
					
					En esta ocasion participaron tambien los agentes especiales de la aviacion no. 5 para el aero-transporte tactico de las fuerzas aereas del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Ellos declararon oficialmente que ese ejercicio continuara hasta el dia 30 en las bases militares en Songnam de la provincia de Kyonggi y Taegu.
					
					Por otra parte, la flota No.1 de las fuerzas maritimas titeres del Sur de Corea despliega desde el dia 3 en el Mar Este de Corea el entrenamiento movil de gran tamano en que fueron movilizados mas de 10 buques de guerra, aviones y un gran numero de efectivos.
					
					Mientras tanto, las unidades especiales de las fuerzas maritimas y la policia maritima titeres del Sur de Corea se enfrascan en el ejercicio militar como la operacion de interceptacion en el mar y la otra contra submarinos pretextando hacer frente a la supuesta "provocacion en la linea de limite al Norte".
					
					Anteriormente, comenzo el dia 2 en distintas localidades del Sur de Corea como Pusan y Ulsan el entrenamiento de movilizacion del cuerpo de reservistas.
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas amenazan con sancionar incluyendo la condena a prision a los que falten en el entrenamiento que se extendera hasta el 9 de noviembre.
					
					Esta maniobra militar se torna cada vez mas caliente en el cielo, la tierra y el mar del Sur de Corea justamente cuando faltan unos dias para el inicio de "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", otro ejercicio militar para agredir a la RPDC.
